alles ist geil

第一代的内容比较少，不是傻宝的话体验整个游戏还是很快的。
实验室中美术风格较为简陋，为了方便解密，减少了不必要的的元素。无人的窥探室作为光源，偏冷的色调营造压迫氛围。
同时在开发者注释模式中，能够从开发者的角度了解到在关卡设计中如何合理并考虑到玩家体验的引入新的概念。有趣的一点是最具杀伤力的机器人却拥有最无辜的性格。
无论GlaDOS是恶毒的，还是因为程序作出回报最大的“正确”判断，人类生存最大的威胁最终还是人类本身。

No game has ever made me feel more empty and alone. I loved every second of it.

An amazing 3D puzzle platformer that revolutionized gaming into where it actually is now with an incredible mechanic used for progression!

Your objective is to use portals to complete all the test chambers the narrator robot, GLaDOS, commands you. Later on, you discover a couple portal guns, which you can use to make your own portals, which can lead to some very clever platforming. And at the end, there's cake for you!... or maybe not.

The portal mechanic is incredible and each and every part of the game is built to make you think. No level is easier than the previous one you just did and every element of the game is important for completions and achievements. There's even 6 advanced chambers with more complexity added + a challenge mode where you can try and beat the individual levels with a set objective! Whether you're a platformer, a puzzler, or an FPS-player, ABSOLUTELY GET THIS GAME!
